sentences.cn: 盘绕（纠结）在一起的树枝

sentences.en: Better not tangle with the censors. They're very vindictive.
sentences.cn: 最好别和检查员发生冲突，他们可爱记仇了。

sentences.en: Don't try and tangle with him -- he is bigger and stronger than you.
sentences.cn: 不要和他动手打架 ― ―他比你高大强壮.

sentences.en: His financial affairs are in such a tangle.
His hair is all in a tangle.
His mind was in a tangle.
sentences.cn: 他的思想陷于困惑之中.

sentences.en: His parachute became tangled in the wheels of the plane.
sentences.cn: 他的降落伞缠在了飞机的轮子上。

sentences.en: I am pretty ugly to tangle with.
I shouldn't tangle with Peter, he is bigger than me.
sentences.cn: 我不应该与彼特吵架, 他的块头比我大.

sentences.en: I was thinking what a tangle we had got ourselves into.
sentences.cn: 我在想，我们卷入了怎样的纷争之中。

sentences.en: If I were you, I wouldn't tangle with them.
sentences.cn: 我要是你, 我就不跟他们争吵.

sentences.en: She was trying to comb some useful things out of the tangle.
sentences.cn: 她正试图从那堆乱糟糟的东西里找出些有用之物.

sentences.en: The boys got into a tangle over the rules of the game.
sentences.cn: 男孩子们在比赛规则上发生了争吵.

sentences.en: There is a tangle of ropes on the deck.
You shouldn't tangle with him -- he's much stronger than you!
sentences.cn: 你不应与他发生 纠缠.他比你强壮得多!

words.tran_cn: 紊乱的；纠缠的；缠结的；复杂的

phrases.tran_cn: 错综复杂的局面（或东西）
与…吵架，争吵；与…争论；与…有纠葛

trans.tran_cn: 纠缠，纠纷，混乱，慌乱，昏乱的状态，争论

trans.tran_en: to become twisted together, or make something become twisted together, in an untidy mass
to become twisted together, or make something become twisted together, in an untidy mass

trans.tran_cn: （使）缠结，（使）乱作一团，使陷入，捕获，使纠纷，参加辩论、争执或冲突
